# Katherine (Kat) Hoffman

I am a biostatistician who is passionate about meaningful and reproducible medical research. I enjoy [writing](/blog), [speaking](/talks), and creating [illustrations](/illustrations) about statistics, programming, and career-related topics. I post new content on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kat_hoffman_), and I am always open to hearing feedback via <a href = "mailto: kathoffman.stats@gmail.com">email</a>.

**Education:**<br> M.S. Biostatistics \| University of Michigan \| 2018<br> B.S. Biochemistry \| University of Detroit Mercy \| 2015

**Experience:**<br>Research Biostatistician \| Weill Cornell Medicine \| 2018-present
